Package pizzapazza.iterator

Class Z4PointIterator

  • java.lang.Object
    • pizzapazza.iterator.Z4PointIterator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Z4NextableWithTwoParams<Z4DrawingPoint,​Z4SpatioTemporalColor,​Z4ColorProgression>, Z4JSONable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Z4Airbrush, Z4Scatterer, Z4Spirograph, Z4Stamper, Z4Tracer
    public abstract class Z4PointIterator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Z4NextableWithTwoParams<Z4DrawingPoint,​Z4SpatioTemporalColor,​Z4ColorProgression>
    The common parent of all point iterators
    Author:
    gianpiero.diblasi

      • drawDemo

        public abstract void drawDemo​(simulation.dom.$CanvasRenderingContext2D context,

                              Z4SpatioTemporalColor spatioTemporalColor,
                              Z4ColorProgression progression,
                              double width,
                              double height,
                              boolean valueIsAdjusting)
        Draws a demo of this Z4PointIterator
        Parameters:
        context - The context where to draw the demo
        painter - The painter to use, it can be null
        spatioTemporalColor - The color to use, it can be null
        progression - The color progression to use, it can be null
        width - The width
        height - The height
        valueIsAdjusting - true if the demo is for an adjusting value, false otherwise
